description: Detects the creation of a suspicious ADS (Alternate Data Stream) file by software other than browsers
author: frack113
false_positives: Other legitimate browsers not currently included in the filter (please add them)
Legitimate downloads via scripting or command-line tools (Investigate to determine if it's legitimate)
name: Creation Of a Suspicious ADS File Outside a Browser Download
query: ((Contents:/\[[Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee][Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\]\ \ [Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee][Ii][Dd]\=3.*/ AND file.path:/.*\:[Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee]\.[Ii][Dd][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Ff][Ii][Ee][Rr]/ AND file.path:(/.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*\.[Ss][Cc][Rr].*/ OR /.*\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Mm][Dd].*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Hh][Tt][Aa].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Ss][Ee].*/ OR /.*\.[Ll][Nn][Kk].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Pp][Tt][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Ss].*/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Ee][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Ss][Cc][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Vv][Bb].*/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Ss][Cc].*/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Ss][Ff].*/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss][Xx].*/)) AND (NOT ((process.executable:/.*\\\\[Bb][Rr][Aa][Vv][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Oo][Zz][Ii][Ll][Ll][Aa]\ [Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ff][Oo][Xx]\\\\[Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ff][Oo][Xx]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Mm][Oo][Zz][Ii][Ll][Ll][Aa]\ [Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ff][Oo][Xx]\\\\[Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ff][Oo][Xx]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\\\\[Ii][Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\\\\[Ii][Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Mm][Aa][Xx][Tt][Hh][Oo][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Ww][Ee][Bb][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\.*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Mm][Ss][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Mm][Ss][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))) OR ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Cc][Oo][Rr][Ee]\\\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Cc][Oo][Rr][Ee]\\\\.*/) AND process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Ww][Ee][Bb][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]2\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Ss][Aa][Ff][Aa][Rr][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Ss][Ee][Aa][Mm][Oo][Nn][Kk][Ee][Yy]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Vv][Ii][Vv][Aa][Ll][Dd][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Ww][Hh][Aa][Ll][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Ss][Cc][Rr][Ee][Ee][Nn][Ss][Kk][Ee][Tt][Cc][Hh]_.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\\\[Ss][Nn][Ii][Pp][Pp][Ii][Nn][Gg][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll]\\\\[Ss][Nn][Ii][Pp][Pp][Ii][Nn][Gg][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND file.path:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\\\.*/ AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\\\[Pp][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa][Gg][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Ss][Cc][Rr][Ee][Ee][Nn][Ss][Kk][Ee][Tt][Cc][Hh]_.*/ AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ee]\\\\[Ss][Cc][Rr][Ee][Ee][Nn][Ss][Hh][Oo][Tt]\ .*/ AND file.path:/.*\.[Pp][Nn][Gg]\:[Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee]\.[Ii][Dd][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Ff][Ii][Ee][Rr]/)))))
